## ğŸ’¡Why categorize them? What are the alternatives?

The [Astro Starlight](https://starlight.astro.build/) integration only supports built-in icon types. Its documentation includes a complete [built-in icon reference](https://starlight.astro.build/reference/icons/#all-icons), but with hundreds of iconsâ€”many of which cannot be used freelyâ€”it can be difficult to find the one you need.

> For alternate solutionsâ€”supporting any custom SVG icon, icon set, or even UTF-8 Emojiâ€”see our tips after the categorized built-in icons list.
